Description: Pottery vase made of straw tempered Nile silt, with conical body, blunt pointed base and roll rim.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 24; but not mentioned in text for this grave. Marked H114 on side Like Rough ware R81 in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
Condition: good: rim chipped, and part missing.
